biotools.summary: Morpheus Spectral Counter (MSpC) as the first computational tool that directly calculates Normalized Spectral Abundance Factor (NSAF) values from output obtained from Morpheus, a fast, open-source, peptide-MS/MS matching engine compatible with high-resolution accurate-mass instruments.

bioschemas.name: MSpC
bioschemas.summary: Morpheus Spectral Counter (MSpC) as the first computational tool that directly calculates Normalized Spectral Abundance Factor (NSAF) values from output obtained from Morpheus, a fast, open-source, peptide-MS/MS matching engine compatible with high-resolution accurate-mass instruments.
